markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sky and Heaven Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2200) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 224, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Jalmeri Heavenseeker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=198)

**Prerequisites**
[Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2198)

**Requirements**
You are unarmored.

</column>

---

Your jagged blows are like lightning. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and have the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199), and [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) traits. While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.

<title level="2">Sky and Heaven Stance leads to...</title>
[Cross the Final Horizon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2205), [Skyseeker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2201)
name: Sky and Heaven Stance
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 224</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2198)

**Requirements**
You are unarmored.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You enter a stance allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky.
</summary>
summary: You enter a stance allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky.
